info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:58PM MDT until June 07 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL SAN MIGUEL...WEST CENTRAL HARDING AND SOUTHEASTERN MORA COUNTIES... At 558 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Roy, or 17 miles west of Mosquero, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Solano. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
